param-doc.name: sentenceLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing sentence annotations, sentences are reinforced.

param-doc.name: yateaExecutable
param-doc.p: Path to the YaTeA executable file.

param-doc.name: wordLayer
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing the word annotations.

param-doc.name: workingDir
param-doc.p: Path to the directory where YaTeA is launched. This parameter is deprecated, use xmlTermsFile and termListFile instead.

param-doc.name: xmlTermsFile
param-doc.p: Path where to write the candidates XML file produced by YaTeA.

param-doc.name: termListFile
param-doc.p: Path where to write the candidates list produced by YaTeA.

param-doc.name: posFeature
param-doc.p: Feature containing the word POS tag.

param-doc.name: perlLib
param-doc.p: Contents of the PERLLIB in the environment of Yatea binary.

param-doc.name: rcFile
param-doc.p: Path to the YaTeA configuration file.

param-doc.name: postProcessingOutput
param-doc.p: BioYaTeA option: path to the result file after post-processing.

param-doc.name: documentTokens
param-doc.p: Either to write DOCUMENT special tokens. Not every YaTeA version accepts them.

param-doc.name: postProcessingConfig
param-doc.p: BioYaTeA option: path to the post-processing file option.
